**Government of Canada Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for BET Surface Analyzer**
===============

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a new BET Surface Analyzer for Natural Resources Canada (NRCan). The tender closing date is **July 24, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT**. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Tender Summary:**
The Government of Canada seeks a reliable provider to deliver a BET Surface Analyzer worthy of use for surface area analysis via both physisorption and chemisorption at NRCan's CanmetMATERIALS (CMAT) facility. The contract period is expected to be three (3) years, with the option to extend for two (2) one-year periods.

**Background:**    The NRCan is searching for a well-established and successful firm capable of meeting Canada's procurement rules and guidelines. The successful bidder must also comply with the related security requirements.

**Key Parameters:**

* Tender Reference Number: WS4540664874-Doc4655356442
* Tender Closing Date: July 24, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Offer Submission Method: Electronic through Ariba Discovery
* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20137991?extsite=MjAxMzc5OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* Language of the solicitation: English
* Expected Contract Commencement Date: August 5, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: August 4, 2027

**Security Requirements: **    All potential candidates are expected to demonstrate an understanding of the security requirements prior to submitting a bid. Firms not in compliance may be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements:**    All trade agreements indicated in the solicitation process are to be adhered to as per the guidelines.

Please contact Kimberly Love (PSPC) at [kimberley.love@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kimberley.love@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for further information and clarification regarding the tender.

To access and download the RFP, please refer to the specific Notice URL or Ariba Discovery. Please direct any questions or comments to the noted contact
